basics.name: Manish Nagaraj
basics.label: PhD Candidate in Electrical and Computer Engineering
basics.summary: PhD candidate focused on data efficiency and optimization in machine learning.

education.thesis: Energy Efficient Byzantine Agreement Protocols for Cyber-Physical Resilience

education.institution: PES Institute of Technology and Science, Bangalore

work.name: Latent AI
work.summary: Developed and optimized tools for anomaly detection and scalable data processing in machine learning workflows.
highlights: Built data annotation tools for anomaly detection frameworks.
Designed scalable systems for handling noisy datasets.
Improved energy and latency metrics for internal ML tools.

projects.name: Efficient Fine-tuning of LLMs
projects.description: Lightweight data selection pipeline for fine-tuning LLMs.
highlights: Developed a lightweight, correlation-based data selection pipeline.

projects.name: Finding the Muses- Identifying Coresets Through Loss Trajectories
projects.description: Efficient coreset selection using loss trajectory correlation.
highlights: SOTA results on CIFAR-100 and ImageNet-1k.

projects.name: DOTIE
projects.description: Energy-efficient object detection using event cameras.
highlights: Lightweight framework leveraging event-driven camera data.
Demonstrated at ICRA 2023 and CVPR 2023 Workshops.

projects.name: TOFU
projects.description: Federated learning with communication and data efficiency.
